definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Now that big brass ring is a shade of black.
sentences.chinese: 現在，大銅環是一個黑色的陰影。

sentences.english: Motor copper rings are a kind of lifting accessories.
sentences.chinese: 電機銅環是起重配件的一種。

sentences.english: I did not have my bunch of keys at the ready14) like a makeshift knuckle-duster.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有把那一大串準備好的鑰匙變成應急的指節銅環。

sentences.english: I did not have my bunch of keys at the ready like a makeshift knuckle-duster.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有把那一大串準備好的鑰匙變成應急的指節銅環。

sentences.english: The device is called motor copper rings.
